flawed_nl_solution:
The total revenue from the adults is 183 x $26 = $4758>>4758.
The ticket price for children is $26/2 = $13>>13.
The total revenue from the children is 28 x $13 = $364>>364.
The total revenue of the concert is $4758 + $364 = $5119>>5119
